sentences.english: Resins and gums are highly flammable.
sentences.chinese: 树脂和树胶也非常易燃。

sentences.english: Some plant gums are used in the manufacture of cosmetics.
sentences.chinese: 某些植物树胶用以制造化妆品。

sentences.english: Arabinogalactan is a water soluble gum extracted from the sawdust of Larix gmelinii( Rupr.
sentences.chinese: 阿拉伯半乳聚糖是从落叶松木屑中提取的水溶性树胶。

sentences.english: Gum Arabic is a natural hydrocolloid.
sentences.chinese: 阿拉伯树胶是纯天然的水合胶体。

sentences.english: I remind them to ask me about my allergy to latex.
sentences.chinese: 我提醒他们问我关于我对树胶有无过敏性的反映。

sentences.english: Durable outsole of recycled regrind and natural gum.
sentences.chinese: 耐磨的外底回收再生料和天然树胶。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the imaging manifestations of cerebral gumma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨树胶肿型神经梅毒的影像学表现。

sentences.english: It occurred to him to add flavoring4 to the chicle.
sentences.chinese: 他想到把香料加到糖胶树胶里。

sentences.english: Gum trees grow in tropical areas.
sentences.chinese: 产树胶的树生长在热带地区。

definition: white wax from Chinese white wax bug (Ericerus pela)
